title: Man.of.Steel.R6.LiNE.Audio.Sync.Fix.2
description:
this is the 2nd audio sync fix, fixed some parts where the audio was off by some miliseconds where you would notice it.

This audio is synced and fixed throughout the whole movie, 
I have took some time out of my day to fix the non-synced 
audio, no need to thank.

Use mkvtoolnix aka mkvmerge GUI to apply this audio on to the Man of Steel R6 LiNE :)

p.s. it will give a warning after done merging, but that is nothing..works perfectly.

p.p.s this version also has the official MoS OST for the credits and also the song 
Chris Cornell - Seasons that played earlier in the movie at 25:07


This is my first torrent, so I Hope you guys like it 
seed and enjoy!
